name: Battle of Puzzles RPG - Dungeon Wars & Epic Battles TCG
name_original: Battle of Puzzles RPG - Dungeon Wars & Epic Battles TCG
description:
The highly addictive yet very new concept card RPG game mixed with Puzzle solving that lets you battle with real players with countless quests and adventures.

Tired of the boring traditional action games?
Want to be more engaged in your battles than simply pressing a button?
We have the solution for you!
Presenting the Battle of Puzzles RPG, an exciting new dungeon exploration game with a twist!
Actively participate in battles using a puzzle based combat system!
Summon and grow your very own Legendary Heroes and form the strongest team ever!
Strategically utilize your Champions’ skills to dominate your enemies!
Manipulate the elements to give yourself the upper hand!
Team-up with your friends to climb to greater heights!

The game features:
*100+ Dungeons
*200+ Unique Champions
*150+ Powerful Skills
*Beautiful Graphics
*Special Time-restricted Dungeons
*Constant Updates with many more Champions and Dungeons to follow!

You get to decide the development of the game. Send your suggestions for Champions, Skills, Stories or anything game related to us and receive a Huge Bonus if your suggestion is chosen!

Join the Battle of Puzzles war now!
